attributes.action: Pull out of the Eurovision Song Contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The UK is one of the "big four" financial contribting countries taking place in the Eurovision Song Contest.

Due to the clear political voting taking place amongst countries, the UK's taking part seems almost pointless and the finances wasted could clearly go to other, more important, matters in the United Kingdom.

So, I propose that the UK, like Italy has already done so, pulls out of the Eurovison Song Contest until the political bias is sorted out.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
